alert.note: Alert for Logan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:23PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Thomas and north central Logan Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 322 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Brewster to near Winona. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Thomas and north central Logan Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
